       java.net.Socket socket,
       java.lang.String enemyName,
       boolean whoStarts,
       javax.swing.JLabel whoseTurn)
        Parameters:
        gameField - the two-dimensional field, on which the game will be played
        socket - to communicate with server
        enemyName - the username of enemy
        whoStarts - true if it is me, who start, otherwise false
        whoseTurn - JLabel to show who is on move
